
#include<bits/stdc++.h>
#define all(x) x.begin(), x.end()
#define pb(x) push_back(x)
#define cout2(x, y) cout << x << " " << y << endl
#define N 302
#define M 100002
#define MOD 1000000007

using namespace std;

int memo[2][N][M];
long long f[N];

int main(){

	int tc;
	scanf("%d", &tc);
	
	for(int i = 1; i < M; i++)memo[0][1][i] = memo[1][1][i] = 1;
	
	for(int i = 2; i < N; i++){
		for(int j = 1; j < M; j++){
		
			//no he quitado
			if(j >= i)memo[0][i][j] = memo[1][i][j - i];
			if(memo[0][i][j] >= MOD)memo[0][i][j] -= MOD;
			
			//ya he quitado
			memo[1][i][j] = memo[0][i - 1][j];
			if(j >= i)memo[1][i][j] += memo[1][i][j - i];
			if(memo[1][i][j] >= MOD)memo[1][i][j] -= MOD;
			
		}
	}
	
	f[0] = 1;
	for(int i = 1; i < N; i++)f[i] = (f[i - 1] * i)%MOD;
	
	while(tc--){
		
		int n, m;
		scanf("%d%d", &n, &m);
		printf("%lld\n", (f[n] * memo[0][n][m])%MOD);
	
	}
}
